item.title: How to setup own selfhosted wiki
item.description: Disclaimer: many links in this post are referral. If you are uncomfortable with it, just search for the text in the links and use results from the search engines. Plan Spin up a new virtual server (1 CPU + 1 GB RAM is fairly enough) in Vultr, Digital Ocean, etc. Register a new domain name Install Docker and Docker Compose Use docker-compose to deploy a wiki Backups Virtual server For example, let it be Digital Ocean.
